entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 29. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of light snow this morning and early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 29. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
